name: Sample and weighted counts of early career U.S. S&E doctorate holders, by subpopulation at graduation (2006–15) and residency: 2017
description: Sample and weighted counts of early career U.S. S&E doctorate holders, by subpopulation at graduation (2006–15) and residency: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_weighted_counts_total_early_career_doctorate_holders
variableMeasured.description: Weighted Counts Total Early Career Doctorate Holders

variableMeasured.name: field_weighted_counts_non_u_s_residents
variableMeasured.description: Weighted Counts Non U S Residents

variableMeasured.name: field_sample_sizes_total_early_career_doctorate_holders
variableMeasured.description: Sample Sizes Total Early Career Doctorate Holders

variableMeasured.name: field_sample_sizes_non_u_s_residents
variableMeasured.description: Sample Sizes Non U S Residents

notes: Early career S&E doctorate holders are those who graduated in 2006–15. Imputed country of origin is country of citizenship at graduation for those reporting this information and it is birthplace for those not reporting country of citizenship. Item nonresponse in the Survey of Earned Doctorates affects citizenship status at graduation, country of origin, and expected post-graduation residency plans. All early career S&E doctorate holders include those with missing and nonmissing information. Weighted population counts rounded to the nearest 50. Detail may not add to total because of missing data due to item nonresponse.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2017, and Survey of Earned Doctorates, 2006–15.
